p: Therefore, this investigation was carried out to test the direct nematicidal effect of NEMguard Â® DE in vitro and in a small pot experiment as protective of tomato roots. Furthermore, its nematicidal efficacy against the root-knot nematode M. incognita was evaluated in two consecutive greenhouse trials, in 2019 and 2020, when first applied close to the freshly planted roots according to the manufacture and as a monthly treatment around the roots, as novel additional controlling option during the growth season.
